channel.title: awards on Kanteron Systems Blog
channel.description: Recent content in awards on Kanteron Systems Blog

item.title: Kanteron wins International Expansion award by Santander Bank and University of Valencia Science Park
item.description: Kanteron Systems wins the ‘International Expansion’ award by Santander Bank at the University of Valencia Science Park’s X Anniversary gala.

item.title: HIMSS Future50 includes Kanteron Systems CEO
item.description: Jorge Cortell, Kanteron Systems’ CEO, has been included in the HIMSS Future50 International: top 50 Healthcare IT leaders, in the category of Innovation.

item.title: NASA ranks Kanteron technology as top 3 health tech of the year and top software
item.description: NASA Space Technology Mission Directorate’s iTech initiative is a yearlong effort to find innovative ideas (through 3 annual Cycles) that address challenges and will fill gaps in five critical areas identified by NASA as having a potential impact on future exploration. In the focus area of Healthcare, Kanteron Systems’ Precision Medicine Software has been selected as a Top healthcare software of the year, top 3 healthcare technology of the year, and top 25 overall technology of Cycle II.

item.title: Kanteron technology selected by NASA to present at event in Florida
item.description: NASA iTech searches for and identifies advancements in technologies that are solving problems on Earth and have the potential to address existing challenges to enable NASA missions. NASA judges selected 10 innovations based on criteria including technical viability, likely impact on future space exploration, benefits to humanity and commercialization potential. One of those innovations selected by NASA is Kanteron Systems’ Precision Medicine Software.

item.title: CEO Monthly names Kanteron Best Medical Imaging & Genomic Data Provider, and its CEO Digital Pathology CEO of the Year
item.description: British magazine CEO Monthly has named Kanteron Systems Best Medical Imaging & Genomic Data Provider, and its CEO, Jorge Cortell, Digital Pathology CEO of the Year.

item.title: Kanteron Systems rated amongst top software startups in the world
item.description: Ratings agency Early Metrics rates Kanteron Systems among the top 4% of Healthcare Technology, and the top 7% overall (their badge rounds up to 10%) of the over 2,000 tech start-ups rated by them worldwide since 2014.

item.title: Kanteron Systems presents in Google Symposium at RSNA 2017
item.description: Kanteron Systems’ CEO speaks at Google Cloud Corporate Symposium in RSNA 2017

item.title: Kanteron Systems, ACR, and Google Cloud to present medical imaging and genomic data integration at RSNA 2017
item.description: Kanteron Systems to Demonstrate the Latest Technology in Medical Imaging and Clinical Genomics with Google Cloud Platform and ACR during RSNA 2017

item.title: In ASHG Microsoft highlights Kanteron Systems as best solution for clinical data integration
item.description: During the American Society of Human Genetics 2017 meeting, Microsoft highlights Kanteron Systems as best solution for clinical data integration.

item.title: Kanteron Systems becomes Google Cloud Platform Technology Partner for Precision Medicine
item.description: Kanteron Systems Brings Expertise in Medical Imaging and Clinical Genomics SaaS to Google Cloud Platform

item.title: Kanteron Systems in the Top 10 Genomics Solution Providers
item.description: Kanteron Systems selected as one of the “Top 10 Genomics Solution Providers 2017”

item.title: According to study, Kanteron has the best CEO in the industry
item.description: According to Owler, the competitive intelligence platform which claims having “the most accurate business information on the planet “, Kanteron Systems has the best CEO in the industry.

item.title: Kanteron declared innovative company
item.description: The Spanish Department of Industry awards Kanteron Systems the Innovative Company seal.
